error_details.explanation: Incorrect operand. The variable 'paid_thursday' (value: 23) was used instead of 'total_paid' (value: 38).

context.question: N/A
context.flawed_solution:
#### 77
So far, Mary has paid back $15 +$23=$<<15+23=38>>38 of the credit.
So she still needs to pay $100-$23=$<<100-23=77>>77
